headline.main: Five Red Army Snipers Kill 1,860 Germans; Marksmen Trained to Hit Squirrel in Eye

lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, Oct. 1 -- The killing of 1,860 Germans by five Russian snipers in two months was reported here yesterday. Today the role of snipers in Stalingrad is stressed and the latest Soviet news reels contains close-up shots of Germans pinked off by an Asiatic sniper on the northwestern front.
abstract: role of USSR Army snipers discussed
